original_text: And the king of Assyria listened to him. The king of Assyria marched up against Damascus and took it, carrying its people captive to Kir, and he killed Rezin.
korean_text: 앗수르 왕이 그 청을 듣고 곧 올라와서 다메섹을 쳐서 점령하여 그 백성을 사로잡아 기르로 옮기고 또 르신을 죽였더라

sentences.original_text: And the king of Assyria listened to him.
The king of Assyria marched up against Damascus
carrying its people captive to Kir,
sentences.korean_translation: 그 백성들을 포로로 잡아 기르로 데려갔다.
